attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the INTERNET DATA EXCHANGE Program of the Greater Las Vegas Association of REALTORS® MLS. Real estate listings held by brokerage firms other than this site owner are marked with the IDX logo.
Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.
Copyright 2023 of the Greater Las Vegas Association of REALTORS® MLS. All rights reserved. [Click here for more information](/info/mls-disclaimers/#mls_25)

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

priceHistory.source: Marshall Stearns Real Estate & Property Management

attributeSource.infoString2: Marshall Stearns Real Estate & Property Management

data.description: Open & Airy 1Story with vaulted ceilings, plant shelves, separate Living Room & Family Room, large rear yard with covered patio, firepit and great for entertaining...Kitchen with Oak Cabs and Granite Tops, Master has large walk in closet and separated from other bedrooms, quality tiles through much of the home, close to everything and priced below $400K!
